Parameters: SentenceSuggestionsInfo: an array of @B_android#view#textservice#SentenceSuggestionsInfo_E@s. These results are suggestions for @B_android#view#textservice#TextInfo_E@s queried by @B_android#view#textservice#SpellCheckerSession#getSentenceSuggestions_E@.

SuggestionsInfo: an array of @B_android#view#textservice#SuggestionsInfo_E@s. These results are suggestions for @B_android#view#textservice#TextInfo_E@s queried by @B_android#view#textservice#SpellCheckerSession#getSuggestions_E@ or @B_android#view#textservice#SpellCheckerSession#getSuggestions_E@

ClassDesc: Callback for getting results from text services
